questions.question: admission procedures
questions.answer: Contact the admissions office at <email> or <phone number> for detailed information.

questions.question: requirements
questions.answer: Vary depending on program, but typically include GPA, standardized test scores, and essays.

questions.question: deadlines
questions.answer: Early action deadline is typically November 1, regular decision is January 1.

questions.question: what should I include in my essays
questions.answer: Highlight your academic achievements, extracurricular activities, and personal goals.

questions.question: what are your top programs
questions.answer: We offer excellent programs in computer science, engineering, and business.
